column5: Renting a boat and just wondering where the best place for fish are?  90% fish in 10% of the water, right?  I heard the South shore is best, true?  Any tips would be great.  Thanks in advance.

not sure when you are going and what you are targetting ?  Pike , I ususally have most luck in the central and east portions ( water 4-10 feet) lots of small fish with the 24 " and up  Bass later in the year , do well along the far shore .  good luck  TB

from the launch to the other side of the lake the underwater contour is basically a 'W' shape.  from shore..shallow -getting deeper to about 15 ft and a hump at the center of the lake to 5 ft to about 12 feet and then shallows to shore. so i have the most success along any weed edge or along the weed flats, avoid all open water.  pike are ubiquitous.
Try different spots and give us a report on which one was the bestest!!!  ... take the camera in case ya catch a fish too!!!
Take me and I,ll show ya and take the pics too.
curious-where's the launch and what's the fee?
you can only access that lake by 1 road...there's two launches I believe.  $5 to launch...at least it was when I was there.
... maybe I need to reread the initial post?... don't remember him saying he wanted to go for the Dinker Perchies...   ... but if that's what he's after... You Da Man Bubba!!!
